about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of commanding your own spaceship while trying to survive in a universe filled with a menagerie of alien races, each with their own agenda. Create and take control of your ship and your crew, as they embark on a procedurally generated adventure filled with dangers, problems, but also infinite solutions.

In Space Shipyard will get to manage your crew, and have them carry out repairs, work the ship's various systems, handle the energy distribution and target weapon systems, while you are waging war against enemy spaceships.

Survival in our highly dynamic, event-filled environments is not easy, and your decisions will define the final outcome of your journey.

Online Multiplayer

Play against friends or random foes!

Single Player

Play a procedurally generated single-player campaign. Travel between the sectors of different races, enjoy a selection of games mode, make tough plot-defining decisions, and survive many boss battles.

Ship Assembly

Customize your ship or even build it from scratch and use it to fight in any game mode, even online!

Dynamic Gameplay

Every crew, ship system, weapon, and battle scenario will impact on yours and your enemy's behavior. Every match will be different! The possibilities are endless. Players create their own ships with unique loadouts, further influencing the constantly changing battlegrounds!
